name: Snake Plant
description: A hardy plant that tolerates low light and infrequent watering. Great for beginners and improves indoor air quality.

name: Peace Lily
description: Known for its beautiful white blooms, the Peace Lily thrives in low light and helps purify the air.

name: Spider Plant
description: An easy-to-grow plant with arching leaves and baby plantlets. Tolerates a range of conditions and is pet-friendly.

name: Aloe Vera
description: A succulent known for its medicinal gel. Prefers bright sunlight and minimal watering.

name: ZZ Plant
description: Extremely drought-tolerant and thrives in low light. Its glossy leaves add a modern touch to any space.

name: Fiddle Leaf Fig
description: A popular statement plant with large, violin-shaped leaves. Prefers bright, indirect light and regular watering.

name: Pothos
description: A fast-growing vine that thrives in various light conditions. Very forgiving and easy to propagate.

name: Rubber Plant
description: Features thick, glossy leaves and grows well in bright, indirect light. Can grow into a striking indoor tree.
